# GitHub Actions Status Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to show workflow status:

## Continuous Integration

```markdown
[![CI](https://github.com/zoocityboy/jaspr_localizations/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/zoocityboy/jaspr_localizations/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
```

## Publish Release

```markdown
[![Publish Release](https://github.com/zoocityboy/jaspr_localizations/actions/workflows/publish-release.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/zoocityboy/jaspr_localizations/actions/workflows/publish-release.yml)
```

